comment.body: @P2P: Seems so. Waiting for more advanced technologies to appear. W'll all be liberated given time as we'll all be dead given time.
@P2P: Have u ever been tired of being so damn right? Sherlock?

@P2P: Unlike some others, I simply believe G translation would be much better. And I also think In depth learning is not just a money-burning activity, it will have its ROE and the day will come when the machines rise. There are forces no one can stop.
